entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MissingMethodException after changing method signature on hot reload #87032
  • Track the New Dynamic Heap Configurations via the GC Configuration API. #87030
  • GC Dynamic adaptation to app sizes: Support configuration using MSBuild property #87028
  • coreclr.dll threw access violation exception #87027
  • TagList.GetEnumerator() allocates #87022
  • Enable relevant thread pool events in Windows #87020
    8.0.0
  • Build method of ConfigurationBuilder taking too much time while initializing pods under kubernetes #87018
    Future
  • Microsoft DI resolves enumerables incorrectly when a matching ServiceType has already been resolved #87017
  • [JIT] Splitting `instrDesc` for EVEX encoded instruction #87016
  • Difference in X509Chain output on Linux and Windows #87010
  • Consider making HTTP diagnostic event payload strongly typed with public types #87008
  • JsonExtensionDataAttribute not working with custom overflow converters in source gen #87005
    Future
  • StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase.Equals is not unrolled for literals #86999
    8.0.0
  • Explicit static interface implementation compiles but program crashes with "Fatal error" with .NET 7 #86993
  • Dynamic heap count perf regressions #87014
  • GlobalInstanceTrackerSupportTests_TargetUnix failing #86990
  • Add analyzer to flag string comparisons without an explicit comparer/comparison #86989

Closed

  • MAUI failed to compile with AOT #81913
  • dotnet publish ends after hours with buffer overflow when publishing dotnet maui app. #81271
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor tests could not find blazor's dotnetjs #87024
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Net.Tests.Perf_WebUtility on arm64 #84787
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 7 Regressions on 1/13/2023 3:30:06 PM #80871
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions from flow graph reordering change #70159
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.Perf_Utf8Encoding #68405
    8.0.0
  • RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan support is failing in some circumstances #79477
    7.0.x
  • Configuration source generator broken when not supplying BinderOptions #86654
    8.0.0
  • Assert failure in GC/API/NoGCRegion/Callback_Svr test #86612
  • Multiple 'System.OutOfMemoryException' errors in .NET 7 #78959
    8.0.0
  • Zip64ExtraField should read StartDiskNumber as uint32 #31825
    8.0.0
  • [BUG] duplicate JIT code generation with readonly struct and DCE #87004
  • App crashes on device when calling static abstract interface method #86884
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM using 'en' culture instead of 'en-GB' when using Accept-Language header #85598
  • Developers can target macOS UI with .NET 6 #44736
    Future
  • Regression: Internal error in ILCompiler #85760
    8.0.0
  • Improve handling when setting an unseekable stream as a tar entry's DataStream #76690
    8.0.0
  • User Story: Developers using C# nullable reference types can use them with more Microsoft SDKs to validate correctness of their code #43619
    Future
  • conv.i4 with NaN returns 0 on macOS M1 #86980
  • [API Proposal]: Support for Atomic "Interlocked" operations on arbitrary length structs #80535

PullRequests

Created

  • Mark some loader tests as NativeAotIncompatible #87035
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • enable DATAS config via runtimeconfig.json #87034
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Sync comment and implementation #87033
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix calling multiple times mono_wasm_asm_loaded when webcil is enabled #87026
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Open generic enumerable resolution fix #87017 #87025
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Documentation for the HotColdMap section #87023
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] Use underlying type in RuntimeHelpers.GetSpanDataFrom #87021
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 7.0.x
  • [mono] Use underlying type in RuntimeHelpers.GetSpanDataFrom #87019
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Delete unused seed file support from PEWriter #87015
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Add comment about NativeAot RIDs #87011
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Repurpose Gen0ReductionCount field for dynamic heap count diagnostics. #87009
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] Revert `HybridGlobalization` normalization. #87007
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Impove StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase.Equals #87006
    area-System.Runtime
  • add review comment to sb files #87003
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, needs-author-action
  • Account for PredefinedCulturesOnly in CultureInfo LCID .ctor #87002
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • [browser] fix legacy interop tests #87001
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix multiplication instruction #86996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Update logging with processor pipeline #86995
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Delete various end symbols #86992
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Copy SPC.dll when BuildDll is disabled #86991
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • More test baselining #86988
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm] CI: Add more wasm specific paths #87029
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Devirtualization with multiple guesses: JIT #86809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add individual compilation tests for each config binding overload #86910
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Revert "Revert "Change our Android build and test legs to use the new CBL-Mariner-based images."" #86967
    area-Infrastructure
  • SHA3 #84132
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Optimize jiterpreter type cast opcodes & add zero page optimizations #86928
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Optimize constant i2/i4 shuffles in jiterpreter #86470
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Read StartDiskNumber as uint32 #83923
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Deferred failures code cleanup #86998
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Update binder gen parser to issue diagnostics for invalid input types #86856
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][build] Fix webcil obj path for publish #86994
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix typo in UMEntryThunkCode::Decode #86997
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix rounding error in getLikelyClassesOrMethods #86965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2191992 #86981
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Optimize Load Immediate #86790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Update runtime-codeql.yml to run 3x/week #86979
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Tar: Improve unseekable stream handling #84279
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • Use IUtf8SpanFormattable.TryFormat in a few more places #86931
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm][build] Don't use GetTempFileName; emit webcil to subdir of obj #86972
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Updated

  • ApplyStartupHook diagnostic IPC command #86813
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add IHostApplicationBuilder interface #86974
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #86048
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fixing the InstructionSetDesc implications #86486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove usage of GeneratedRegex #86911
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • POH allocation fix #86802
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance based on JMC #86982
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Disable mark list optimization if we hit a per region mark list overflow #86508
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Added IReadOnlyDictionary to HttpRequestOptions #86983
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono][aot] Generate 'native-indirect' wrappers in full-aot mode. #86934
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • Adopt Microsoft.DotNet.XunitAssert fork #86193
    area-Infrastructure
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • [libs] Fix poll events conversion #86843
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample as functional test on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • TarEntry: remove some unneeded checks when extracting symbolic and hard links. #85378
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [CoreCLR] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` non-generic support #86932
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Update to use the cbl-mariner webassembly images. #86806
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Save 260k in InitValueNumStoreStatics #85945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #84250
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement collation native functions functions #86895
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    NO-MERGE, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Implement AsnReader.Clone #86913
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Asn1, 8.0.0
  • Enable Native AOT testing in System.Text.Json. #86975
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • [Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Fix HTTP/1.1 concurrent request content read race condition #86715
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [browser][MT] GC, threadpool and some JS interop improvements #86759
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Add back cmake command-line cache on unix #86764
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [debugger][mono] Block multithreading debugger failures #86501
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable EventPipe support in MacOS #86766
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add conditional substitution for IsDynamicCodeSupported when targeting ios-like platforms #86971
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios
  • [mono][infra] Upgrade iOS performance queue to OSX 13 #86574
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Implement genCodeForIncSaturate #86891
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NativeAOT] allow creating CCW for resurrected objects #86882
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: expand qmarks earlier #86778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Test passing struct on a border of 12bit offset #86914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
